alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 7:23AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Meigs, Washington, southeastern Athens, north central Jackson and Wood Counties through 800 AM EDT... At 722 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Belpre to 6 miles northeast of Pomeroy. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 166 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 10. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
